definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: Creative Adam and Eve inspired blanket cover for your bed.
sentences.chinese: 受亚当和夏娃所启发的创意毛毯床罩。

sentences.english: This helps fight off the urge to curl back up under the blankets and fall back asleep.
sentences.chinese: 这能帮你击退缩回毛毯下睡觉的强烈欲望。

sentences.english: Two new blankets were thrown across the two beds.
sentences.chinese: 两条新毛毯丢在两张床上。

sentences.english: He lay down on his blanket.
sentences.chinese: 他静静地躺在他的毛毯上。

sentences.english: Finally, she wiggled out from under a heavy blanket and out of the machine.
sentences.chinese: 最后，她从一张厚重毛毯与机器中摆动脱身。

sentences.english: The mother wrapped up the little child in a blanket.
sentences.chinese: 母亲把小孩用毛毯裹得严严的。

sentences.english: Please cover a blanket on the infants in case of the cold wind.
sentences.chinese: 请给婴儿们盖上一床毛毯以阻挡冷风。

sentences.english: "I know a lot of people want to send blankets and water, " said former President George W. Bush, making his first public appearance at the White House since leaving office a year ago.
sentences.chinese: 我知道很多人想送些毛毯和水过去。

sentences.english: Blanket woven, went to learn Ed.
sentences.chinese: 毛毯织不齐，就去学编席。

sentences.english: Place a coat, jacket, or blanket under her.
sentences.chinese: 在她的身下铺上大衣，夹克，或者毛毯。

sentences.english: The cottons are meant to be combined with destructured jackets, felts, or hairy glenchecks.
sentences.chinese: 棉也可以与夹克，毛毯，或毛格子呢结合。

sentences.english: People in cities across the quake-hit area rushed out of their homes carrying pillows and blankets.
sentences.chinese: 在地震区的城市居民带着枕头和毛毯四处奔散。

sentences.english: I bought a new blanket in case your sister stays with us this week.
sentences.chinese: 我买了一条新毛毯以备这周你妹妹和我们同住。

sentences.english: The development process of cationic-dyeable polyester raschel carpet was recounted.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了阳离子可染涤纶拉舍尔毛毯产品的研制过程。

sentences.english: She lay on the sofa, cocooned in blankets.
sentences.chinese: 她躺在沙发上，用毛毯把自己包了起来。

sentences.english: He lay huddled amongst his blankets in bed, his knees almost touching his chin.
sentences.chinese: 他用毛毯裹着在床上缩成一团，膝盖几乎碰着下巴。
